item.title: Creating A Blog In Hugo
item.description: Why Hugo Hugo is a great tool to generate static website but honestly it is a boring framework to work with. There’s no fancy technology, neither you can create any funky functions to fetch your Github repo Readme or any of your Medium articles. It uses Go at its core which was the one and only reason for me to go with Hugo, though later I found out the benefits and features which makes it unique and perfect for creating simple static websites like this blog.
